Row.Text: +200 [ICON_GOLD] Gold whenever you conquer a city for the first time or +100 [ICON_GOLD] Gold when you earn [ICON_GOLD] Gold from a Barbarian Outpost. The [ICON_GOLD] Gold amount granted for both becomes +500 [ICON_GOLD] Gold after you research Steel (on Standard Speed).

Hail Caesar! General, patrician, and dictator of Rome. Your people – and your ambition – call to you across the ages. The die is cast – and let none stand against your vision, whether they be your bitter foes, or your closest friends.
